description: Parameters for supervisor_tool - validates generated output quality using LLM analysis

given_task.description: Description of the task that was performed. Example: 'I got task to generate crawl plan for given target url based on collected information from other agents. The plan should include recommended fields and crawler configuration in json format.'

input_data.description: The input data that was provided to the agent (collected_information array or object). This is what the agent based its work on.

output_data.description: The generated output to validate (plan content, crawler config, or other generated artifact). This is what needs to be checked for quality.

context_data.description: Optional additional context that might help in validation (e.g., special requirements, constraints)
